R

rank - Variable in class controller.LeaderboardController.LeaderboardRowData
 
ratio - Variable in class model.BattleshipUser
 
readyGame() - Method in class controller.GameController
Method that tests if no ships are overlapping and uploads their positions to the database.
reduceHealth() - Method in class game.Ship
Reduces the health of the ship by 1
refreshList() - Method in class controller.JoinGameController
Refreshes the list of games, by reloading them from the database
registerShip(Ship) - Method in class game.Board
Registers a ship in the class variable "board", which is a 2D-array Sets grid-positions the ship occupy to the ship's index in the ship-array
registerShipCoordinates(int, int, int, int, int) - Method in class game.Board
Registers ship coordinates from a base x and y, width and height, like the coordinates DatabaseConnector.java gives you
registerShipCoordinates(Ship) - Method in class game.Board
 
registerUser(String, byte[], String, byte[]) - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Method for registering users in the database
registerUser(String, String, String) - Static method in class database.Login
Handles registering of a new user with the desired username, password, and email.
registerUser(BattleshipUser) - Static method in class database.Login
Overload of registerUser.
releaseConnection(Connection) - Method in class database.ConnectionPool
Releases the specified Connection to the ConnectionPool for future use
removeGameFromDatabase(Game) - Method in class database.DatabaseConnector
Removes a game from the database

returnButton - Variable in class controller.GameResultMenuController
 
rotateRight() - Method in class game.Ship
Rotates the ship 90 degrees clockwise and updates the Ship's position-offset to make the ship be displayed at the right position in the Board's grid.
rotateRight(int) - Method in class game.Ship
Rotates the Ship 90 degrees clockwise a set amount of times (the parameter).
rotation - Variable in class game.Ship
The current rotation of the Ship in degrees
RowData(String, String, int) - Constructor for class controller.JoinGameController.RowData
 
run() - Method in class database.PullThread
Overrides the void run in the thread class, this will run in a loop, first loop checks if another user has joined the game and readied up- if it tells the game and the game starts The second loop checks if a new move has been made, it will only run if its the opposing user's turn to make a move if that's the case, it will check the database for a new move every second.
running - Variable in class database.PullThread
